error.userNotFound: The username or password you have entered is incorrect.
error.invalidStructure:
The password you entered has an invalid structure.
Passwords must obey the following rules:
- Must be of length between 8 and 14.
- Must not contain your name
- Must contain at least one lowercase letter (a-z).
- Must contain at least one digit (0-9).
- Must contain at least one of the following symbols: %~!@#\$^*=+?[]{}.
- Must not contain the following characters: < or >
error.alreadyUsed:
Invalid Password.
This password has been used in the past. Please select a new password.

entitlements.title: Entitlements
entitlements.description: Manage your entitlements settings and specific end-user permissions to content in your applications.

manageUsersPermissionsEditMessage.title: Error
manageUsersPermissionsEditMessage.description: You must save the category before setting its user permissions

contentPrivacy.label: Content Privacy
contentPrivacy.help:
The content privacy option that you select will define the visibility of content in this category, including its related metadata. This setting will apply to the application's content search results, content lists or specific content item retrieved.

For content associated with more than one category, the privacy will be determined based on the category with the lowest restriction level.

Additional playback restrictions may apply through each entry's access control settings.
contentPrivacy.noRestrictions_explanation: Visible to everyone with access to the application page
contentPrivacy.requiresAuthentication_explanation: Visible only to authenticated end users
contentPrivacy.private_explanation: Visible only to users with specific permissions to access this category content

categoryListing.label: Category Listing
categoryListing.help: The category listing option that you select will define who can see this category's name and metadata in the application's category menus & listing.
categoryListing.noRestrictions_explanation: Visible to everyone with access to the application page
categoryListing.private_explanation: Visible only to users with specific permissions to access this category content

contentPublishPermissions.label: Content Publish Permissions
